Name: NCases
Description: number of case forms (values 0-8) or NA

Name: NClass
Description: number of gender or inflectional classes (values 0-3) or NA

Name: NNumber
Description: number of number distinctions (values 0-3) or NA

Name: INT
Description: is the relative marker also used as an interrogative? - values: yes, related, relatedmaybe, no, NA

Name: Origin
Description: what is the source of the marker in PIE?

Name: COMP
Description: is the relative marker also used as a complementizer? - values: yes, no, NA

Name: Genre
Description: is the form used in spoken or written language? - values: spoken, written, both

Name: RMForms
Description: collection of relative markers used in a language
